testcase.name: Successful login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User launch Chrome Driver.............................................passed When User opens URL "http://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login"...............passed And User enters Email as "admin@yourstore.com" and password as "admin"......passed And click on login..........................................................passed Then page title should be "Dashboard / nopcommerce administration"..........passed When user click on logout link..............................................passed Then page title should be "Your Store. Login"...............................passed And close browser...........................................................passed
